sources.title: The Icebreaker (Ledokol) | Full Movie | Action Survival Adventure | True Story
sources.description:
The Icebreaker (Ledokol) - Antarctica, 1985. The icebreaker “Gromov” was trapped on the ice after trying to dodge a giant berg. For 133 days in cold and deafening silence, the crew attempts to find the way out. One false move – and they will be crushed in the ice.
2016.  Stars: Pyotr Fyodorov, Sergey Puskepalis, Aleksandr Pal

metadata.Plot: Mikhail Klus is a representative of one of the rarest professions on Earth - a ship freezer. Every winter, in the frost for minus 50, freezers are dulling ice tunnels in the ice of the river to repair ships.
metadata.Actors: Albert Kichikov, Aleksandr Klus, Mikhail Klus
